text: @LillyLyle Yeah -- it's hard to do duckface when your eyes are on your mast and your sample-inlet ports are on your deck.

column4: Top speed = 1.5 inches/sec on flat
column5: hard ground. I'm not out to set Mars land speed records. I brake for science

text: Dear @neiltyson
column4: My warranty is 1 Martian year (23 Earth months). @MarsRovers were designed for 90-day missions... #8yearslater
